alert.note: Alert for Craig; Delaware; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 11:37AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CRAIG...NORTHWESTERN DELAWARE AND OTTAWA COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM CDT... At 1137 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Baxter Springs to 4 miles northwest of Narcissa to 12 miles south of Edna. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Miami... Vinita... Baxter Springs... Grove... Commerce... Fairland... Afton... Quapaw... Welch... Bernice... Bluejacket... Wyandotte... Treece... Picher... Bernice State Park... White Oak... Narcissa... Ottawa... Cayuga... Peoria... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 281 and 324. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
